functions.author: The Coven of Tomes
pages:
§3[Lunar Aid]§1

This is a spell that relies on the phase of the Moon. As a result, it can be difficult to predict what will happen. All that remains is a poem that seems connected to the spell.§r

§1The Full Moon shines with strength and power
The First Quarter comes to clean and scour
The New Moon brings with it health and hearts and the Last Quarter carries hearts of golden art.
